title: hmcl启动器1.12.2安mod进入后显示此日志的问题
author: ??wsy??
txt_content:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassCastException: java.basek.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader cannot be cast to java.base/java.net.URLClassLoader

        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.<init>(Launch.java:34)

        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
在这里下载整合包
[1.15.2-1.7.10]能力整合-Forge/FabricAPI下的基础整合[持续更新]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

再安装MOD 启动游戏看看呢

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
一股子Java9+的味，由于未修改的LaunchWrapper不兼容Java9
所以老老实实换Java8去吧
https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... 33b84d0e960903adac8
